description: React component implementing a customizable alert dialog using Radix UI primitives and utility functions for styling.

classes.name: AlertDialogOverlay
classes.description: Overlay component with animated fade and zoom effects, using React.forwardRef.

classes.name: AlertDialogContent
classes.description: Main content container for the alert dialog, centered with animations and styling.

classes.name: AlertDialogHeader
classes.description: Header container for the alert dialog, styled with flex layout.

classes.name: AlertDialogFooter
classes.description: Footer container for the alert dialog, with reverse flex layout for buttons.

classes.name: AlertDialogTitle
classes.description: Title component with styling, using React.forwardRef.

classes.name: AlertDialogDescription
classes.description: Description text component with styling, using React.forwardRef.

classes.name: AlertDialogAction
classes.description: Action button component, styled with buttonVariants, using React.forwardRef.

classes.name: AlertDialogCancel
classes.description: Cancel button component with outline variant, using React.forwardRef.

methods.name: React.forwardRef
methods.description: Used to create components that support ref forwarding for overlay, content, title, description, action, and cancel components.

methods.name: cn
methods.description: Utility function for conditional className concatenation.

methods.name: buttonVariants
methods.description: Function returning style variants for buttons.
